attributes.action: Make illegal the practice of forced contributions to any another pension fund where your own is less generous.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every person should have the right to place a minimum level of investment in their own pension or savings, before ANY deductions or payments are taken from earnings (such as through taxes) to be used for the pensions of others. The only exception should be to cater for the standard state pension.

This would ensure that those with larger pension pots would contribute to those with less, instead of (as in many cases) the other way around.
